text: Paul Linger (20 December 1974 â€“ 1 October 2021) was an English professional footballer. He played in the Football League as a midfielder for Charlton Athletic, Leyton Orient and Brighton & Hove Albion. On 1 October 2021, Linger died of pancreatic cancer at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:Charlton Athletic F.C. players Category:Footballers from London Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Paul Linger
